adminMetaDesc: Manage system-wide settings, user roles, and view system logs with Collabify.
pleaseLoginViewPage: Please log in to view this page.
noPermission: You do not have permission to view this page. Only users with the admin role can access this page. Please <1>contact the admin</1> to get roles.
manageSystemWide: Manage system-wide settings, user roles, and view system logs.
assignOrRevoke: Assign or revoke roles for a user.
recentLoginActivity: View recent login activity, audit logs, and alerts.
roleChangeError: An error occurred while changing the role. Please check the information and try again.
